snippet: Stephon Marbury, a former N.B.A. star, denied that he struck a fan during a confrontation after a game on Sunday. The episode was the latest to highlight the rowdiness of the sport in China.
abstract: Stephon Marbury, a former N.B.A. star, denied that he struck a fan during a confrontation after a game on Sunday. The episode was the latest to highlight the rowdiness of the sport in China.

headline.main: Differing Accounts of Another Basketball Brouhaha in China
